it turns out that there are

mindset the brain becomes most
active when receiving information about

but for people with a growth mindset the
brain becomes most active when receiving
information
about what they could do better next
time in other words
people with a fixed mindset worry the

there are other consequences of mindset
people with a fixed mindset see effort

something that only people with low

while those with a growth mindset see

so to protect their ego they
